name: @fire/pocketsmith-api
author: Serge Krstic
description: A Typescript wrapper around PocketSmith's REST API.

scripts.generate:api: rm -rf src/generated-api; openapi-generator generate -i ./src/config/pocketsmith-openapi.json -o src/generated-api -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=8.5.5,typescriptThreePlus=true
